channel.title: Summary :: K-State CIS 400 Textbook
channel.description: In this chapter we explored the concept of data binding and how it is employed in Windows Presentation Foundation. We saw how bound classes need to implement the INotifyPropertyChanged interface for bound properties to automatically synchronize. We saw how the binding is managed by a Binding class instance, and how we can customize its Path, Mode, and Source properties in XAML to modify the binding behavior. We bound simple controls like <TextBlock> and <CheckBox> and more complex elements like <ListView> and <ListBox>.
